snippet: The North Korean state companies were put on a blacklist of firms banned from international trade in response to the country’s launching of a rocket last month.
abstract: United Nations Security Council puts three North Korean state companies on a list of firms banned from international trade in response to the country's launching of a rocket in April; firms are Green Pine Conglomerate, Amroggang Development Banking Corporation and Korea Heungjin Trading Company.
lead_paragraph: The North Korean state companies were put on a blacklist of firms banned from international trade in response to the country’s launching of a rocket last month.

headline.seo: U.N. Group Puts 3 North Korea Companies on Blacklist
headline.main: U.N. Committee Puts 3 North Korean Companies on a Blacklist
headline.print_headline: U.N. Committee Puts 3 North Korean Companies on a Blacklist
